cookie.pretext: GOV.UK uses cookies to make the site simpler

help.heading: Use this to:
help.bullet-1: see what work you might be doing in the role
help.bullet-2: check if you have the right skills
help.bullet-3: update your CV to show that you have skills or experience that fit the job
help.bullet-4: think of relevant experience that you can share with an employer

titles.heading: Words to use in your online search

help.heading: Use this to:
help.bullet-1: search job adverts – they can use different names for similar roles, so search with some of these words to find more adverts

help.heading: Use this to:
help.bullet-1: see the sort of qualifications you usually need for this role
help.bullet-2: figure out what training you need, so you can work out where to get it
help.bullet-3: plan a career path and discuss next steps with your work coach

help.heading: Use this to:
help.bullet-1: get a rough idea of how many hours per week you'd be working and how much you'd be paid
help.bullet-2: look for a career path that might make you more money
